text: [Music]
this is a story of pure love and faith
it was a beautiful summer morning count
alaric was on his horse trot towards his
kingdom he came upon an open field hello
are you ok miss miss are you hurt
can you speak no I am not hurt look at
the Sun doesn't it look beautiful it
very surely does yes
but count Alaric hadn't even looked at
the mighty son he was mesmerised with
the lady's beauty her pale skin and
bright eyes were all he could see he
instantly fell in love with her
miss are you lost what's your name I I
don't know you don't know your name no
how did you come here I don't remember
anything when I woke up I was already in
this field looking at this beautiful
sunrise I don't remember anything else
count
Alaric knew he had to help her there was
no way he was going to leave her alone
in the field miss please come with me to
the castle you will be taking good care
of and meanwhile I will try to find your
family you're very kind
I will come with you count Alaric was so
happy to hear those words but he
couldn't take his gaze off the lady she
seemed to be looking at him but her eyes
were lost as if she was thinking of
something else maybe she is scared I
must protect her
they rode to the castle count Alaric
commanded his servants to take special
care of his guests he soon realized that
he has to name the beautiful lady
he immediately named her Katherine for
he could not think of a name more
suitable that's a beautiful name thank
you Katherine was happy but not entirely
she seemed to be thinking of something
else maybe she is tired
I must look after her days weeks months
passed but there was no news of
Katherine's family nobody even in the
neighboring kingdoms had heard of her
the count desperately wanted to help her
he couldn't bear the look in her eyes
like there is something she is missing
he wanted to make her happy what if I
asked her to marry me
well she say yes I must tell her that I
love her I have everything to keep her
happy the count immediately asked
Katherine to marry him Katherine smiled
she liked this kind man who had helped
her she obliged and soon they were
married the count had the fanciest
marriage ceremonies the kingdom had ever
seen
after all the count was marrying the
love of his life at least a thousand
people attended the wedding he could see
the awe on all of their faces whoa the
countess is the luckiest woman in the
world look at this grand arrangement he
must really love her she must be really
happy
the count smiled but one look at the
countess and his heart sank a little my
dear aren't you happy of course my love
count
Alaric believed her but there was that
look in her eyes again as if she was
thinking of something else
count Alaric had run out of excuses to
comfort himself the kingdom could not
have had a better countess than
Katherine everybody loved her she
treated everyone with love and respect
but count Alaric was sad he knew she
didn't wholly belong to him each year
that count threw a ball for his people
everybody danced their hearts out even
those who didn't know how to dance
but the countess was quiet she was
neither dancing nor smiling the look in
her eyes killed the count each day he
tried asking her several times but she
always held him tight smiled and said I
love you dear and I am happy with you
though she looked at him the count knew
she was thinking of something else then
one night as the count entered his room
he was surprised to see that Katherine
was dancing dear why don't you ever
dance with me what I never danced you
know that oh my sweetheart but you were
dancing just now when I entered the room
don't you remember what no I don't dance
but I sometimes do hear soft music as if
it's playing somewhere far away as if
it's calling me
count Alaric was confused a year passed
soon it was their anniversary the count
thought of surprising his beloved
countess a night before the anniversary
he rode up to the very field they first
met in Katherine will be so happy
wait what is that I have never heard
such a beautiful tune in my life the
fairy people I thought there were all
these stories quiet Theodora this is
such a strange scene wait who is that is
that and they're dressed in a beautiful
pink gown was the love of his life
Katherine Katherine but before he could
take a closer look his horse birth head
Theodore was scared to his whip he
started running into the jungle Oh quiet
Theodore
calm down you're taking me away from the
fairies there there quiet boy see how
far you brought me let's go back Oh No
they are gone they count rushed back he
was relieved to see that the countess
was sleeping peacefully in their bedroom
my love where were you what I was
sleeping you seemed tired you must sleep
too it's late wait I am NOT wrong it was
her why is she lying to me she looks so
happy there Oh what do I do now only one
person can help me Magda the count
trusted Magda she knew all the secrets
to this world after traveling for two
whole days he reached a small Hut deep
inside the jungle what brought you here
it's the countess Magda I need your help
the count narrated the whole story to
Magda he also explained the look in
Catherine's eyes that always pained him
she looks at me but she's always
thinking about something else
what do I do oh my dear there is nothing
you can do your wife is one of the fairy
people
she must have stayed behind last summer
when you found her they call out to her
she will go to them every summer to
dance she may come back for now but
there will come a day when she won't
what no she belongs with me isn't there
any way that she can forget that life
completely and become mine forever
give me some herbs some magic potion
anything my child
no herb or magic is strong enough to
make one forget their past she would
always be connected to where she came
from but there is one thing what I will
do that right away tell me your love has
to be perfect
only then she will forget her past is it
my love perfect how do I make it perfect
then
that only time will teach you don't
worry my child go home and have faith in
your love count Elric went back to the
castle
he was now more polite and kind to his
wife yet every night she left the castle
the count had several sleepless nights
wondering if this is the night that
takes his beloved wife away then one
fine day that's enough I will follow her
today and show her how much I love her
my love
is perfect and I will prove it that's it
Catherine it's me your husband I have
come to take you away come with me don't
you remember my love come with me
Catherine realized that the count was
too strong for her she smiled brightly
dear let me finish my dance and I
promise I will come with you
after no you are lying look at me there
are tears in my eyes fairies don't know
how to cry your love taught me that no
Catherine you belong with me sisters
give me your strength
be strong sister be strong be strong
sister be strong be strong sister
peaceful sister world be wild sister be
wild wild wild sister be flowy history
Valley
a fiery sister fiery library sister be
high if I hold you till dawn you will
still be partly mine but he did not let
go of the flame and you are too strong
for me I cannot leave you the count was
happy
I knew my love was perfect Catherine are
you okay my love but the countess didn't
speak she crouched and moaned it killed
the count to see his lady unhappy
Catherine if you stay with me will you
remember your people and be sad I shall
only faintly remember them I shall not
be sad but I shall always feel there is
something I have lost and if you went
back to your people would you remember
me no I should remember none of it I
will only be happy I cannot see you
unhappy my love I love you too much
dearest go back to your people be where
you are truly happy
count Ulric never looked back he could
not bear to see the meadow empty behind
him after riding aimlessly for hours he
reached his castle
who is that Catherine oh my love what
happened when I woke up I was alone in
the field how did I go there I knew you
must be looking for me oh dear it
doesn't matter all that matters is that
you were here with me I love you I love
you too and he knew she meant it for her
eyes were looking for him and nothing
else
it was count Elric's faith and pure love
that had brought his lady to him perfect
love is when you love somebody else's
happiness more than your own
[Music]
